identificationModule.briefTitle: Screening and Management of High-risk Populations of Stroke in Dehui City
identificationModule.officialTitle: Screening and Management of High-risk Populations of Stroke in Dehui City

responsibleParty.investigatorTitle: Associated Dean of First Hospital of Jilin University
responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: The First Hospital of Jilin University

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This epidemiological survey is to analyze the prevalence rate of stroke and exposure rate of risk factors in sampling population aged 40 years and over (born before December 31,1975) in Dehui City, to provide scientific basis for pertinent prevention and control of stroke in Jilin Province, and to provide valuable data for the high-risk groups to carry out regular follow-up and standardized management.

armGroups.label: Low-risk Group
armGroups.description: Low-risk Group is defined as the population with \<3 risk factors (hypertension, dyslipidemia or dyslipoproteinemia, diabetic mellitus, atrial fibrillation or valvular heart disease, smoking, lack of exercise or light manual labor, overweight or obesity and family history of stroke), but without chronic disease (hypertension, diabetic mellitus, atrial fibrillation or valvular heart disease).
interventionNames: Other: Advice according to primary prevention guidelines on stroke of China

armGroups.label: Mediate-risk Group
armGroups.description: Mediate-risk Group is defined as the population with \<3 risk factors (hypertension, dyslipidemia or dyslipoproteinemia, diabetic mellitus, atrial fibrillation or valvular heart disease, smoking, lack of exercise or light manual labor, overweight or obesity and family history of stroke), but meanwhile suffer from chronic disease (hypertension, diabetic mellitus, atrial fibrillation or valvular heart disease).
interventionNames: Other: Advice according to primary prevention guidelines on stroke of China

armGroups.label: High-risk Group
armGroups.description: High-risk Group is defined as the population with â‰¥3 risk factors (hypertension, dyslipidemia or dyslipoproteinemia, diabetic mellitus, atrial fibrillation or valvular heart disease, smoking, lack of exercise or light manual labor, overweight or obesity and family history of stroke), or population with history of stroke or/and transient ischemic attack.
interventionNames: Other: Advice according to primary prevention guidelines on stroke of China

interventions.name: Advice according to primary prevention guidelines on stroke of China

primaryOutcomes.description: The proportion of stroke in the general population.
The proportion of hypertension in the general population.
The proportion of diabetes mellitus in the general population.
The proportion of dyslipidemia in the general population.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Aged 40 years and over in Dehui City
* Willing to participate in the study and follow-up visits
* Signed an informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Life expectancy\<3 years
* Unwilling to participate in the study and follow-up visits
* Living away from Dehui City over 6 months
* Unable to cooperate with examination and questionnaire due to mental disease
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Target population aged 40 years and over (born before December 31,1975) was selected from Dehui City by means of group sampling.
